Body:
N = np.array([[1.0, 0, 0], [0, cosd(sgu), -sind(sgu)], [0, sind(sgu), cosd(
    sgu)]])
M = np.array([[cosd(sgl), 0, sind(sgl)], [0, 1, 0], [-sind(sgl), 0, cosd(sgl)]]
    )
OM = np.array([[cosd(om), -sind(om), 0], [sind(om), cosd(om), 0], [0, 0, 1]])
UB = np.dot(OM, M)
UB = np.dot(UB, N)
UB = np.dot(UB, B)
return UB
